full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 743 Filed 08/10/22 Page 71 of 247 199 LBUCmax3 Visoski - cross in sexual activity with underage girls on the flights you piloted; isn't that right? A. Correct. Q. Mr. Visoski, I want to ask you some questions about how the flights were scheduled and set up. Okay? A. Sure. Q. Now, before a flight was scheduled, you and Dave Rogers needed to be alerted ahead of time that Epstein needed to fly somewhere; isn't that right? A. Yes. Q. I think you said typically you get about a day's notice; isn't that right? A. That's correct. Q. And several different people would call you to schedule these flights; is that right? A. Yes. Q. And in the 1990s, focusing on that time period, you would occasionally get calls from Epstein himself to schedule flights? A. He would call on occasion, yes. Q. And every once in a while, you'd get a call from Ghislaine, as well? A. Sure. Q. But during that time period, it was usually Epstein's secretary or one of his other assistants in New York who would SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00011843
